title: Missing Number
solution_steps: ["Count from 1 to 5", "Find the missing number", "The answer is 3"]

title: Picture Addition
solution_steps: ["Count the first group: 2 apples", "Count the second group: 1 apple", "Add them together: 2 + 1 = 3"]

title: Uppercase Match
problem: Match the uppercase letter with lowercase: A
solution_steps: ["Look at the uppercase A", "Find the matching lowercase letter", "The answer is 'a'"]

title: Letter Writing
problem: Which letter comes after B in the alphabet?
solution_steps: ["Recite the alphabet: A, B, C", "The letter after B is C"]
